headline.main: BRITISH CRUISER HIT, ITALY CLAIMS; Torpedo Planes Fight Convoy Escort -- Germans Report Sinking Another Warship BRITISH CRUISER HIT, ITALY CLAIMS

lead_paragraph: ROME, Oct. 26 -- In a battle between Italian torpedo planes and a British convoy said to be rushing supplies, including some from the United States, to Libya in preparation for a Winter offensive, the Italian High Command claimed tonight that the planes hit a British cruiser on Saturday in the "central part" of the Eastern Mediterranean.
abstract: Itals claim Ital planes hit Brit cruiser in eastern Mediterranean convoy battle; rept air raids on Malta, Brit raids on Tripoli and Bengazi; Germans claim bombers sank Brit cruiser off Bardia; RAF bombs Naples; Brit rept attacks on Tobruk slackened

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
